abstract: Amy Haimerl and Karl Kaebnick have gone into debt for a house valued at $100,000 less than they’ve spent. But they love it.
snippet: Amy Haimerl and Karl Kaebnick have gone into debt for a house valued at $100,000 less than they’ve spent. But they love it.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Many residents of high-cost areas entertain the dream, at least occasionally: Give up the rent or mortgage grind, liquidate assets and start over someplace cheaper, perhaps one that could use a few spirited new residents.

headline.main: In a Big Hole for a Detroit House, but Happy
headline.print_headline: In the Hole for a House in Detroit, but Happy

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Detroit Hustle: A Memoir of Life, Love and Home (Book)
